content: with easter **chicken season** is coming feel free to use any yarn you want with according hook size if you use fine yarn 50g = 125m and a 3mm hook the chicken is approx 13-14 cm long you will need 2-3 colors and a little bit in black the pattern is quite easy and suitable for beginners only the wings are a bit tricky but i´m sure you will manage i recommend reading the information of the pattern paragraph abbrevations prior to starting work
